name: Akismet Credit Inserter
author: D'Arcy Norman

sections.description: A very simple mu-plugin to automatically (automattically?) insert a “Spam prevention powered by Akismet” notice (with hyperlink to Akismet.com) in the footer of each blog hosted on a WordPress Multiuser service to abide by the licensing terms of Akismet. Adds a small “Spam prevention powered by Akismet” to the footer of every blog to abide by Akismet licensing terms.
sections.installation:
1. Place the akismet-credit-inserter.php file in wp-content/mu-plugins or, I suppose, in wp-content/plugins (but then it would need to be manually activated for each site…)
  2. there is no step 2
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • November 3, 2008 – Initial release. It’s so simple, what could possibly change?

1.0.1

  • November 7, 2008 – Minor update to add some style attributes to the div, as suggested by Joss Winn

short_description: Adds a small "Spam prevention powered by Akismet" to the footer of every blog to abide by Akismet licensing terms.

screenshots.caption: A very simple line of text (with a hyperlink to Akismet.com) is inserted in the footer of the blog.
